snippet: The league met with members of the players union’s leadership with an agenda that included the Saints bounty program and the standoff over blood testing for human growth hormone.
abstract: National Football League meets with members of the players union’s leadership with an agenda that includes the New Orleans Saints bounty program and the standoff over blood testing for human growth hormone.
lead_paragraph: The league met with members of the players union’s leadership with an agenda that included the Saints bounty program and the standoff over blood testing for human growth hormone.

headline.seo: At N.F.L. Meeting, League and Union Have Much to Discuss
headline.main: N.F.L. and Union Meet on Bounties
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. and Union Meet on Bounties
